mapper.select: select memidx, memname, memnick from member where mememail=#{param1} and mempw=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into member(mememail, mempw, memname, memnick, memphone, membirth, memgender) values (#{mememail},#{mempw},#{memname},#{memnick},#{memphone},#{membirth},#{memgender})
mapper.select: select cridx, crname, crnick crnick from carry where crid=#{param1} and crpw=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into carry(crid, crpw, crname, crnick, crgender, crphone, placename) values (#{crid},#{crpw},#{crname},#{crnick},#{crgender},#{crphone},#{placename})
